related_questions.question: Contoh dialog recount text dalam bahasa inggris (dialog 6 org)

answers.answer:
Fadli: Hi Dina, long time no see you. You do not come together with Handi?
Dina: Yes, I'm with Handi, he was buying something out there.
Handi: Fadli, how are you?
Fadli: Finally you come, I've been waiting for a long time. I'm fine, how about you?
Handi: I'm very well today and am very happy to hang out together with you. Does Ari have here? I haven’t seen it.
Fadli: I've called him and he would come in 5 minutes.
Handi: I cannot wait to see him.
Dina: Yes, me too. He said that his business is so wonderful right now.
Fadli: So, what do you do now?
Dina: I was working at an insurance company and now I'm trying a new hobby.
Fadli: I am curious about your hobbies. What is it?
Dina: Ask to Handi.
Fadli: Handi, tell me what your new hobby now? And I will tell my hobby that is very interesting for you to try.
Handi: Well, I'll tell you but you must tell your new hobby later. We have a hobby called Jumping Stilts and known as an extreme sport and is currently so popular in Indonesia.
Dina: Yes, we join with community of Jumping Stilts Indonesia and practice every week at different places. We tried this hobby because there was a friend who was very good at doing Jumping Stilts. We were interested in, and then try it until now. What about you? What is your new hobby?
Fadli: I have a hobby that is not far from you. It is also an extreme sport that is so famous all over the world.
Dina: Let me guess, is it Parkour?
Fadli: No, this is a Bungee Jumping. A very extreme sport for your adrenaline.
Handi: We've heard for a long time and really got us interested. Can you tell me what places have you visited?
Fadli: Not many, but I'm very lucky to get a chance to try the beautiful places. I visited Bali in Indonesia. I've also been to Colorado, USA. It is the highest bungee jump in the world, positioned in 12th, located not far from the Grand Canyon National Park, USA. Has a 142m just above the Colorado River, right in the historic Navajo Bridge. With stunning wild amazing Grand Canyon make it a popular destination for bungee jumping.
Dina: Amazing. Your hobby is very spectacular and makes me want to try it.
Handi: You're crazy, it was great! Hey, Ari has come.
Fadli: Ari, why you so late? You missed the story on Bungee Jumping in Colorado.
Ari: I'm stuck in traffic. How are you all? Pleased to meet you. Hi Dina? You're here too?
Dina: Of course, we're telling some of our new hobby. What about you?
Ari: Last week, I climb Semeru, and next week I wanted to Papua.
Handi: Climb Jayawijaya?
Ari: Of course, you want to come?
Fadli: Fantastic, you have a new hobby that is very interesting to try. I want to go with you next week. Incidentally, I want to take time off for a thing, but I decided to go with you.
Ari: Is that true? I'm very glad if you could come. I have not talked to you and feel a togetherness as it used to. What about you guys? Handi, Dina, come or not?
Dina: I am going to come, and Handi would participate also.
Handi: Hey, I have not decided anything.
Ari: You have to come Handi, if you have the heart to let Dina walked alone up the Jayawijaya?
Handi: Let me join you all.
Fadli: This will be an amazing experience. We have never gone together since 6 years ago right?
Ari: I agree with you. This will be the best experience we have ever had. Ready to go to Jayawijaya?
Fadli, Handi, Dina: Of course.

related_questions.question: Contoh opini setuju dengan adanya saving a parkland.

answers.answer:

i agree to save parkland,cause parkland usually made as a oxigen producers of a big city ,a parkland can make a ton of oxygen so parkland must build in the centre of the city to absorb the carbon dioxide and produce oxigen

lingking verb"be"/auxiliary verb +/-not+pronoun
note:
----> lingking verb "be" (yaitu:is,am,was,were,are)
----> auxiliary verb berupa primary auxiliary verb (be,do,have) atau modal auxiliary verb(will, would, may, might,can, could, shall, should) yg cocok dg verb bagian pernyataan
-----> pronoun yg cocok dg subject bagian pernyataan.
example: you love sains, don't you?

related_questions.question:
Tlong dong artiin    the golden compass
lyra belaqua,and her daemon pantalaimon,had lived as an orphan in jordan collage for years. her only relative was her uncle, lord asriel. he was a scientist and an adventurer,and was busy doing his experiment in north pole. therefore, lyra was taken care by the professors and scholars of jordan collage because she had no other place to go. one day lyra overhead the conversation between her uncle and the college senate. it was an extraordinary conversation about a microsco-pic particle,called dust. this particle was said to unite different worlds, and was feared by many who want to destroy it forever. it was what lord asriel experimenting in the north. at the time, she did not know that this conversation would drag her into a dangerous adventure of her faith. soon after that,her uncle was reported missing in the north. and lyra had to leave jordan college to live under the care of a woman named mrs.coulter. at the beginning,she liked her new life,and learned many things as a young girl.

answers.answer: kompas emaslyra Belaqua , dan Pantalaimon daemon nya , telah hidup sebagai yatim piatu di jordan kolase selama bertahun-tahun . hanya relatif nya pamannya , Lord Asriel . dia adalah seorang ilmuwan dan seorang petualang , dan sedang sibuk melakukan percobaan di kutub utara . Oleh karena itu , lyra adalah diurus oleh profesor dan sarjana dari jordan kolase karena dia tidak punya tempat lain untuk pergi . satu hari lyra overhead percakapan antara pamannya dan senat perguruan tinggi. itu adalah percakapan yang luar biasa tentang partikel microsco - pic , yang disebut debu . partikel ini dikatakan untuk menyatukan dunia yang berbeda, dan ditakuti oleh banyak orang yang ingin menghancurkannya selamanya . itu adalah apa yang Lord Asriel bereksperimen di utara . pada saat itu , dia tidak tahu bahwa percakapan ini akan menyeretnya ke dalam petualangan berbahaya imannya . segera setelah itu , pamannya dilaporkan hilang di utara . dan lyra harus meninggalkan jordan perguruan tinggi untuk hidup di bawah perawatan seorang wanita bernama mrs.coulter . di awal , dia menyukai kehidupan barunya , dan belajar banyak hal sebagai gadis muda .

Kompas emas
Lyra belaqua, dan pantalaimon daemon nya, telah hidup sebagai seorang yatim piatu di Yordania kolase selama bertahun-tahun. Ia hidup hanya bersama pamannya, Tuhan asriel. Ia adalah seorang ilmuwan dan seorang petualang yang sibuk melakukan eksperimen di Kutub Utara. oleh karena itu, Lyra adalah diurus oleh para profesor dan sarjana Yordania kolase karena dia tidak ada tempat lain untuk pergi. Suatu hari Lyra mendengar percakapan antara pamannya dan Senat perguruan tinggi. Percakapan itu sangat luar biasa percakapan tentang partikel microsco-pic, disebut debu. Partikel ini dikatakan untuk menyatukan dunia yang berbeda, dan ditakuti oleh banyak orang yang ingin menjadi penghancur selamanya. Itu membuat Tuhan asriel  bereksperimen di Utara. Pada waktu itu, ia tidak tahu bahwa percakapan ini akan menyeret dirinya ke dalam petualangan yang membahayakan imannya. Setelah itu pamannya dilaporkan hilang di utara. Dan lyra harus meninggalkan yordan perguruan tinggi untuk hidup di bawah perawatan seorang wanita bernama mrs.coulter. Di awal kehidupanny, dia menyukainya kehidupan baru, dan belajar banyak hal seperti seorang gadis muda.
